channel.description: Recent content in the bierhaus on BarCamp Cork

item.title: BarCamp The Afters
item.description: After a bit of tooing and froing, we’ve decided to have no official place for food after BarCamp, it’s just too awkward to arrange for that many people. There are tons of good places to eat in the city centre and I’m sure groups of you can organise yourselves. However, the final destination of the evening will be The BierhausÂ on Pope’s Quay. The route is as follows:
